  "user": "64eea509d88ee6bcef09d77f",
  "comments": 0,
  "relevant": false,
  "rank": 5,
  "image": "https://res.cloudinary.com/practicaldev/image/fetch/s--cZ6cVfW7--/c_imagga_scale,f_auto,fl_progressive,h_420,q_auto,w_1000/https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/cgyynwwqse41vsfl9o7p.png",
  "title": "üìú Novu's Communication Manifest: Lighting the Path to our Future üí°",
  "body": "üìú Novu's Manifest üìú
1. üß° Always Assume Good Intentions

No matter the form everyone has something we can learn from.

We firmly uphold the principle of seeing the best in people and that everyone we interact with can offer us valuable insights, enhancing our collective wisdom.
2. üü∞ ALL Ideas and Opinions are Equal, Regardless of Hierarchy or Source

Every voice matters at Novu.

We promote a culture where everyone's opinions are held as equal, irrespective of their role or level within the company.
3. üß† Be Mindful of How You Communicate

We understand that communication is a powerful tool.

We strive to be mindful of our words, tone, and actions to ensure we respect and value each other's feelings, perspectives, and experiences.
4. üèõÔ∏è Support Each Other to Become Better Communicators

We share a collective passion for shaping a better world.

Our dedication is reflected in our relentless pursuit to enhance our communication prowess and cultivate a culture rooted in learning and growth.
5. ü™ü Be Transparent and Explicit with Expectations

Transparency is key to our operations.

We express our expectations clearly and explicitly, making sure that everyone has a clear understanding of their roles, responsibilities, and the goals we are striving to achieve together.
6. üí¨ Publicize Decisions and Consider All Affected Individuals

We are committed to open communication.

We publicize our decisions and make sure that all affected individuals are considered and informed before finalizing any major decisions.
7. üå™Ô∏è Remain Adaptable to Others' Priorities and Needs

We understand that in a fast-paced environment, adaptability is critical.

We articulate our priorities and needs while staying flexible to accommodate the changing needs and priorities of our colleagues, customers, and community.
8. üìù Assume Unavailability and Plan Accordingly

We operate in a global environment, and as such, unavailability is a given.

We plan and execute our tasks with this in mind to ensure that our operations run smoothly and efficiently, regardless of time zones and personal schedules.
9. üì° Communicate All Necessary Details for Planned Interactions

We value clarity and precision in our interactions.

We ensure that all necessary details for planned interactions are communicated effectively, making our meetings productive and valuable for everyone involved.
10. üôè Make an Effort to Promptly Respond to Others

We are committed to going above and beyond.

We make an effort to respond quickly to others, acknowledging their contributions, and keeping our collaborative efforts moving forward as we understand that prompt responses are crucial for effective collaboration.
The way forward

These ten principles are the bedrock of our operations at Novu and the people we support.

They guide us in our quest for excellence, and they serve as a beacon to light our path as we continue to innovate and grow. ",
  "tags": [
    "#Kodemia,",
    "#remote,",
    "#html"
  ]
}
